title: Herb Jones for Congress | Virginia's First District
cleaned_text: Herb retired after 30 years in the U.S. Army with rank of full-colonel and being awarded a Bronze Star for Iraq service. After retirement, he served New Kent County as Treasurer for 12 years. Now Herb's community is asking him to serve again—this time in the halls of Congress. On January 6, 2021, the Republican incumbent voted against certifying the presidential election. He ignored the will of 2.4 million Virginia voters. The founding principles of our Nation are under attack. Now, more than ever, we need ethical and courageous leaders to fight back. We will win this election, but it won't be cheap. My opponent accepts hundreds of thousands of dollars from corporate PACs and Dominion. Pitch in a few dollars today to help fuel our grassroots campaign to put people back in power in Congress. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately.
